data.actual_result: You are muted with a cut off mute icon displayed
data.expected_result: You are muted with a full mute icon displayed.
data.short_description: **IPHONE X ONLY** In a Video DM Group, when you mute yourself, the mute icon in the top right is cut off.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into Discord. - DM Video call a user and have the user answer. - Mute yourself.
